mapper.select: select am.admin_menu_id as adminMenuId,am.menu_name as menuName,am.parent_id as parentId,am.menu_level as menuLevel,am.url as url,am.menu_order as menuOrder from admin_menu am start with am.admin_menu_id in ( select ap.admin_menu_id from admin_permission ap,admin_role_r_permission arp,admin_user_r_role aur where arp.admin_permission_id = ap.admin_permission_id and aur.admin_role_id = arp.admin_role_id and aur.admin_user_id = #{adminUserId} union select apuser.admin_menu_id from admin_user_r_permission aurp left join admin_permission apuser on aurp.admin_permission_id = apuser.admin_permission_id where aurp.admin_user_id = #{adminUserId} ) connect by prior AM.parent_id = am.admin_menu_id
